price: To, amma Ãdãwa, sai suka yi girman kai a cikin kasã, bã da wani hakki ba, suka ce: "Wãne ne mafi tsananin ƙarfi daga gare mu?" Ashe, kuma ba su gani ba cẽwa Allah, wanda Ya halitta su Shĩne Mafi ƙarfi daga gare su, kuma sun kasance a game da ãyõyin Mu suna yin musu?
arabic: فَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَقَالُواْ مَنۡ أَشَدُّ مِنَّا قُوَّةًۖ أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَهُمۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗۖ وَكَانُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā ʿādun fa-is'takbarū fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi waqālū man ashaddu minnā quwwatan awalam yaraw anna al-laha alladhī khalaqahum huwa ashaddu min'hum quwwatan wakānū biāyātinā yajḥadūna
